00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostStreamF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE PostStreamF
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Fs, ux, uy, U_sq, v
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: aux, rhon, tau, invTau, invTau2, invCsRho
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPsiX_f, gradPsiY_f, gradRhoU, gradPsiU, gradRhoPsi
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: feq, Gam
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradPsiD, gradRhoD
00047 
00048 
00049  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00050    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00051 
00052 ! Define some local values
00053      rhon = rho_f(i,j)
00054      ux   = u_f(i,j,1)
00055      uy   = u_f(i,j,2)
00056      U_sq = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00057      tau  = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00058      invTau   = 1.D0/(1.D0 + 2.D0*tau)
00059      invTau2  = tau*invTau
00060      invCsRho = invCs_sq*rho_f(i,j)
00061 
00062 ! Identify neighboring cells
00063      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00064      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00065      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00066      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00067 
00068 !--------- Standard Derivatives ------------------------------------------------
00069 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00070      gradPsiX_f = ( 4.D0*( psi_f(ie,j ) - psi_f(iw,j ) ) + psi_f(ie,jn) &
00071                 - psi_f(iw,js) + psi_f(ie,js) - psi_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00072 
00073      gradPsiY_f = ( 4.D0*( psi_f(i ,jn) - psi_f(i ,js) ) + psi_f(ie,jn) &
00074                 - psi_f(iw,js) + psi_f(iw,jn) - psi_f(ie,js) )*inv12
00075 
00076 !--------- Directional derivatives ---------------------------------------------
00077 ! Gradient of the density rho
00078      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(ie,j)  - rho_f(iw,j) )
00079      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(i,jn)  - rho_f(i,js) )
00080      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(iw,j)  - rho_f(ie,j) )
00081      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(i,js)  - rho_f(i,jn) )
00082      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(ie,jn) - rho_f(iw,js) )
00083      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(iw,jn) - rho_f(ie,js) )
00084      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(iw,js) - rho_f(ie,jn) )
00085      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(ie,js) - rho_f(iw,jn) )
00086 
00087 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00088      gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(ie,j)  - psi_f(iw,j) )
00089      gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(i,jn)  - psi_f(i,js) )
00090      gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(iw,j)  - psi_f(ie,j) )
00091      gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(i,js)  - psi_f(i,jn) )
00092      gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(ie,jn) - psi_f(iw,js) )
00093      gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(iw,jn) - psi_f(ie,js) )
00094      gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(iw,js) - psi_f(ie,jn) )
00095      gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(ie,js) - psi_f(iw,jn) )
00096 
00097 !--------- Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the distribution function f --------
00098      aux    = W0C*U_sq
00099      Gam(0) = W0 - aux
00100      feq(0) = ( W0 - aux )*rhon
00101 
00102      aux    = W1C*(ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00103      Gam(1) = W1 + aux 
00104      feq(1) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00105 
00106      aux    = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00107      Gam(2) = W1 + aux
00108      feq(2) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00109 
00110      aux    = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00111      Gam(3) = W1 + aux
00112      feq(3) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00113 
00114      aux    = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00115      Gam(4) = W1 + aux
00116      feq(4) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00117 
00118      v      = ux + uy
00119      aux    = W2C*(v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00120      Gam(5) = W2 + aux
00121      feq(5) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00122 
00123      v      = -ux + uy
00124      aux    = W2C*(v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00125      Gam(6) = W2 + aux
00126      feq(6) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00127 
00128      v      = -ux - uy
00129      aux    = W2C*(v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00130      Gam(7) = W2 + aux
00131      feq(7) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00132 
00133      v      = ux - uy
00134      aux    = W2C*(v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00135      Gam(8) = W2 + aux
00136      feq(8) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00137 
00138 ! Directional terms common to all f components
00139      gradRhoU   = ux*gradRhoX_f(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00140      gradPsiU   = ux*gradPsiX_f      + uy*gradPsiY_f
00141      gradRhoPsi = gradRhoU - invCsRho*gradPsiU
00142 
00143 !--------- Collision and stream for the distribution function f ----------------
00144      Fs = Gam(0)*gradRhoPsi
00145      f(i,j,0) = fbar(i,j,0) + invTau*( feq(0) - fbar(i,j,0) ) - invTau2*Fs
00146 
00147 ! Direction 1
00148      Fs = Gam(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(1) - gradRhoPsi )
00149      f(i,j,1) = fbar(i,j,1) + invTau*( feq(1) - fbar(i,j,1) ) + invTau2*Fs
00150 
00151 ! Direction 2
00152      Fs = Gam(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(2) - gradRhoPsi )
00153      f(i,j,2) = fbar(i,j,2) + invTau*( feq(2) - fbar(i,j,2) ) + invTau2*Fs
00154 
00155 ! Direction 3
00156      Fs = Gam(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(3) - gradRhoPsi )
00157      f(i,j,3) = fbar(i,j,3) + invTau*( feq(3) - fbar(i,j,3) ) + invTau2*Fs
00158 
00159 ! Direction 4
00160      Fs = Gam(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(4) - gradRhoPsi )
00161      f(i,j,4) = fbar(i,j,4) + invTau*( feq(4) - fbar(i,j,4) ) + invTau2*Fs
00162 
00163 ! Direction 5
00164      Fs = Gam(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(5) - gradRhoPsi )
00165      f(i,j,5) = fbar(i,j,5) + invTau*( feq(5) - fbar(i,j,5) ) + invTau2*Fs
00166 
00167 ! Direction 6
00168      Fs = Gam(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(6) - gradRhoPsi )
00169      f(i,j,6) = fbar(i,j,6) + invTau*( feq(6) - fbar(i,j,6) ) + invTau2*Fs
00170 
00171 ! Direction 7
00172      Fs = Gam(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(7) - gradRhoPsi )
00173      f(i,j,7) = fbar(i,j,7) + invTau*( feq(7) - fbar(i,j,7) ) + invTau2*Fs
00174 
00175 ! Direction 8
00176      Fs = Gam(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(8) - gradRhoPsi )
00177      f(i,j,8) = fbar(i,j,8) + invTau*( feq(8) - fbar(i,j,8) ) + invTau2*Fs
00178 
00179    END DO
00180  END DO
00181 
00182  RETURN
00183  END SUBROUTINE PostStreamF
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
